journal: International Journal for Parasitology: Drugs and Drug Resistance
title: Corrigendum to ‘the anti-fecundity effect of 5-azacytidine (5-AzaC) on Schistosoma mansoni is linked to dis-regulated transcription, translation and stem cell activities’ [Int. J. Parasitol. Drugs and Drug Resist. 8 (2018) 213–222]
